text: Jo badey badey gunahon aur khule khule qabeeh afaal (shameful deeds) se parheiz karte hain, illa yeh ke kuch kasoor unse sarzad ho jaye. Bila shubhah tere Rubb ka daaman-e-magfirat bahut waseeh hai. Woh tumhein us waqt se khoob jaanta hai jab usne zameen se tumhein paida kiya, aur jab tum apni maaon (mothers) ke paiton (wombs) mein abhi janin (fetuses) hi thay. Pas apne nafs ki paaki ke daawe na karo. Wahi behtar jaanta hai ke waqai muttaqi kaun hai
